Map Select Cleaning Type Unit of Measure AboutFull Home Deep clean: Home Cleaning Cleaning of the house including all rooms, bathrooms, kitchen. Vacuum cleaning of sofas, carpets, curtains and mattresses Scrubbing of flooring, tiles, using suitable machinery. Dusting and cleaning of windows, railings, fans, lights and cabinets. Professional equipment includes single disc machine, vacuum cleaner, ladder and duster. Does not include: Cleaning of utensils, Walls and ceiling washing, Polishing of wooden furniture and flooring Full Home Deep clean: Deep cleaning of bathroom, kitchen, living room, dining room, bedroom and balcony cleaning. Deep cleaning of external surfaces, cabinets and appliance exteriors and removal of grease and oil stains. Deep cleaning of floor, WC seat, sink fittings and walls. Cleaning of doors, cupboards, handles and wardrope exteriors. Cleaning of fans, lights, cabinets, underneath bed. Dry vacuming of sofa, curtain and carpets using professional grade cleaning solutions, cleaning equipment and vacuum cleaners by professional cleaning staff. Equipment used: Single Disk Machine, Steam Machine, Vaccum Cleaner, Scotch Brite Scrubber, Small Wipers, Bucket, Mugs, Toilet Brush, Disposable Bags Hard Cloth Duster, Microfiber Duster About Full Home Basic clean: Includes cleaning bathroom, kitchen, living room, dining room, bedroom. Dry vacuuming of sofa, curtain and carpets using professional grade cleaning solutions, cleaning equipment and vacuum cleaners. Equipment used Vaccum Cleaner, Scotch Brite Scrubber, Small Wipers, Bucket, Mugs, Toilet Brush, Disposable Bags Hard Cloth Duster, Microfiber Duster Full Home professional clean : Professional cleaning includes bathroom, kitchen, living room, dining room, bedroom and balcony cleaning. Deep cleaning of external surfaces, cabinets and appliance exteriors and removal of grease and oil stains. Deep cleaning of floor, WC seat, sink fittings and walls. Cleaning of doors, cupboards, handles and wardrope exteriors. Cleaning of fans, lights, cabinets. Post construction and post renovation cleaning, stain removal (Paint), floor scrubbing and floor polishing. Dry vacuming of sofa, curtain and carpets using professional grade cleaning solutions, cleaning equipment and vacuum cleaners by professional cleaning staff. Equipment used Single Disk Machine, Steam Machine, Vaccum Cleaner, Scotch Brite Scrubber, Small Wipers, Bucket, Mugs, Toilet Brush, Disposable Bags Hard Cloth Duster, Microfiber Duster skip next previous
